DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Nerve Fibers Detection in Patients With Different Gynecological Pathologies
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this study is to investigate the prevelence of endometrial nerve fibers in different gynecological pathologies in addition to its relation to chronic pelvic pain
DOC.criteria: 1. Age: 2060 years of age. 2. Written and signed informed consent by the patient to participate in the study. 3. Women candidate for surgical intervention either via laparoscopy or laparotomy for different gynecological pathologies 1. Suspected endometriosis. 2. Patient unwillingness to participate in the study. 3. No hormonal treatment for the last 6 months. 4. Suspected pregnancy.
